event_name: INNO YUDH - 24 Hours National Level Hackathon
department: Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, NSRIT (Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology)
venue: NSRIT (Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology), Visakhapatnam
description: A 24-hour national level hackathon named 'INNO YUDH' designed to promote innovation, covering various themes like Industry 4.0, Agriculture, Healthcare, IoT, AI & ML, Blockchain, App Development, and Student Innovation.
additional_info: Organized by E-CUBE. In association with ECOMEDUSYS PVT LTD. NSRIT is an Autonomous and NBA Tier 1 Accredited institute. Register via QR code. Instagram handle: e.cube.official.
raw_text: NSRIT Autonomous NADIMPALLI SATYANARAYANA RAJU INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY VISAKHAPATNAM NBA NATIONAL BOARD OF ACCREDITATION TIER 1 ACCREDITED DEPARTMENT OF ELECTRONICS AND COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING IN ASSOCIATION WITH ECOMEDUSYS PVT LTD E-CUBE PRESENTS INNO YUDH 24 HOURS NATIONAL LEVEL HACKATHON DATE: 12th - 13th DECEMBER 2025 THEMES: > INDUSTRY 4.0 > AGRICULTURE > HEALTH CARE > APP DEVELOPMENT > IOT > AI & ML > BLOCK CHAIN > APP DEVELOPMENT > STUDENT INNOVATION PRIZE POOL 50K+ ABSTRACT SUBMISSION: 23rd NOVEMBER 2025 REGISTER NOW for more info please contact: FACULTY CO-ORDINATOR Dr Konari Rajasekhar +91 90106 63282 e.cube.official innoyudh.info@gmail.com
